verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> after they were come <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
Let the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> also <S%H6213>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> at his appointed <S%H4150>season.<s%>

In the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> <S%H996>at<s%> <S%H6153>even,<s%> ye shall <S%H6213>keep<s%> it in his appointed <S%H4150>season:<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2708>rites<s%> of it, and according to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4941>ceremonies<s%> thereof, shall ye <S%H6213>keep<s%> it.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they should <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>passover.<s%>

And they <S%H6213>kept<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H996>at<s%> <S%H6153>even<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai:<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And there <S%H1961>were<s%> certain <S%H376>men,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H2931>defiled<s%> by the dead <S%H5315>body<s%> of a <S%H120>man,<s%> that they <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> on <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> and they <S%H7126>came<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> on <S%H1931>that<s%> day: <S%H3117><s%>

And <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H587>We<s%> are <S%H2931>defiled<s%> by the dead <S%H5315>body<s%> of a <S%H120>man:<s%> <S%H4100>wherefore<s%> are we kept <S%H1639>back,<s%> that we may <S%H1115>not<s%> <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H853><s%> an <S%H7133>offering<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in his appointed <S%H4150>season<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, Stand <S%H5975>still,<s%> and I will <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H6680>command<s%> concerning you.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3588>If<s%> any <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H376><s%> of you <S%H176>or<s%> of your <S%H1755>posterity<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H2931>unclean<s%> by reason of a dead <S%H5315>body,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> be in a <S%H1870>journey<s%> afar <S%H7350>off,<s%> yet he shall <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

The <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H996>at<s%> <S%H6153>even<s%> they shall <S%H6213>keep<s%> it, and <S%H398>eat<s%> it <S%H5921>with<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> and <S%H4844>bitter<s%> herbs.

They shall <S%H7604>leave<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> it <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7665>break<s%> any <S%H6106>bone<s%> of it: according to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2708>ordinances<s%> of the <S%H6453>passover<s%> they shall <S%H6213>keep<s%> it.

But the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H2889>clean,<s%> and <S%H1961>is<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> in a <S%H1870>journey,<s%> and <S%H2308>forbeareth<s%> to <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>passover,<s%> even the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from among his <S%H4480>people:<s%> <S%H5971><s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he <S%H7126>brought<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H7133>offering<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in his appointed <S%H4150>season,<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H2399>sin.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> shall <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H854>among<s%> you, and will <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> according to the <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> of the <S%H6453>passover,<s%> and according to the <S%H4941>manner<s%> thereof, <S%H3651>so<s%> shall he <S%H6213>do:<s%> ye shall <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2708>ordinance,<s%> both for the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> and for him that was <S%H249>born<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And on the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H853>that<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> was reared <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> namely, the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony:<s%> and at <S%H6153>even<s%> there <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> as it were the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H784>fire,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>
So <S%H3651><s%> it <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H8548>always:<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> it by day, and the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night.<s%>

And <S%H6310>when<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was taken <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle,<s%> then <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3651>that<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed:<s%> and in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H7931>abode,<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> pitched their <S%H2583>tents.<s%>

At <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed,<s%> and <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> they <S%H2583>pitched:<s%> as long <S%H3605>as<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H7931>abode<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> they rested in their <S%H2583>tents.<s%>

And when the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> tarried <S%H748>long<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> then the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8104>kept<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> <S%H3808>not.<s%>

And so it <S%H3426>was,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> a <S%H4557>few<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle;<s%> according <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> they abode in their <S%H2583>tents,<s%> and according <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> they <S%H5265>journeyed.<s%>

And so it <S%H3426>was,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H1961>abode<s%> from <S%H4480>even<s%> <S%H6153><s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and that the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was taken <S%H5927>up<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> then they <S%H5265>journeyed:<s%> <S%H176>whether<s%> it was by <S%H3119>day<s%> or by <S%H3915>night<s%> that the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was taken <S%H5927>up,<s%> they <S%H5265>journeyed.<s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> whether it were two <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H2320>month,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H3117>year,<s%> that the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H748>tarried<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> <S%H7931>remaining<s%> <S%H5921>thereon,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> abode in their <S%H2583>tents,<s%> and <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> <S%H3808>not:<s%> but when it was taken <S%H5927>up,<s%> they <S%H5265>journeyed.<s%>

At <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> they rested in the <S%H2583>tents,<s%> and <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> they <S%H5265>journeyed:<s%> they <S%H8104>kept<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
